resources.string: Click on the presentation and study the specialities offered by Vitebsk State University named after P.M. Masherov.
Write an essay in English using the language models such as "2nd Conditional sentences" about your future profession and the speciality you plan to enter, and then present it in front of the class.
Listen to the audio about international cooperation at the VSU named after P.M. Masherov.
Study the presentation about Yelnya Ecological Trail and write down new vocabulary in your notebooks.
The task: To consolidate new vocabulary, do a written translation of the presented text into Russian in your notebook.
